title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 103.4 - Special retail warehouse permit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 103.4 - Special retail warehouse permit

State Regulations
(a) Chapter 545 of the Laws of 1995 empowered the authority to issue a special
retail warehouse permit to persons licensed pursuant to sections
54
and
54-a
of the Alcoholic Beverage Control Law
under conditions listed in subdivisions (b) and (c) of this section. (b) No more than five such permits may be
issued on a statewide basis at any time. (c) No licensed premise owned by a licensee
can have more than 2,500 square feet of retail space and no licensee can employ
more than five people on each premises during any period of
operation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
103.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
